item.title: codeforces #319 div 2 E C. Points on Plane (分块)
item.description: 初识分快. 引一段题解： Let's split rectangle 106 × 106 by vertical lines into 1000 rectangles 103 × 106. Let's number them from left to right. We're going to pass through points rectangle by rectangle. Inside the rectangle we're going to pass the points in increasing order of y-coordinate if the number of rectangle is even and in decreasing if it's odd. Let's
